security: The cable discusses operational details and the briefing and training of an individual (identified by the digraph 'BE'). Releasing these details could expose operational methods and compromise individuals involved in sensitive activities. Areas indicating sensitivity: 'WILL CONTACT [16-27] ON ARRIVAL' and 'CONCERNED BRIEFING AND TRAINING OF [02]TIDE'.
summary: A Director cable dated December 14, 1963, concerns the travel, briefing, and training arrangements for Mr. Alexander Shatton, who is scheduled to arrive in Sao Paulo on December 20, 1963.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET Director cable, dated December 14, 1963, outlines the travel plans for Mr. Alexander Shatton, who is arriving in Sao Paulo on December 20 via Pan Air do Brasil 201. The cable indicates that Shatton will contact the station upon arrival and includes a comment noting concerns regarding his briefing and training. The communication is directed to Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, and JMWAVE, with information copies to various CIA divisions.
title: Director Cable Re Travel to Sao Paulo
